org.trianacode.gui.components.map

Interface MapLayoutConstants


  • public interface MapLayoutConstants
    Constants used by the map components.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.awt.Dimension DEFAULT_TOOL_SIZE
      The preferred default size for a tool on the map layout.
      static double MAP_UNIT
      A map unit is the preferred height of a location on the map layout and is used as the base for other dimensions

    • Field Detail

      • MAP_UNIT

        static final double MAP_UNIT
        A map unit is the preferred height of a location on the map layout and is used as the base for other dimensions

      • DEFAULT_TOOL_SIZE

        static final java.awt.Dimension DEFAULT_TOOL_SIZE
        The preferred default size for a tool on the map layout.
